sn1.37:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi;
sn1.37:4.3: dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya bhikkhusaṃghañca.
sn1.37:4.4: Atha kho catunnaṃ suddhāvāsakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ etadahosi:
sn1.37:4.5: “ayaṃ kho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi;
sn1.37:4.6: dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya bhikkhusaṃghañca.
sn1.37:4.8: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike paccekaṃ gāthaṃ bhāseyyāmā”ti.
sn1.37:5.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
sn1.37:5.4: suddhāvāsesu devesu antarahitā bhagavato purato pāturahesuṃ.
sn1.37:5.5: Atha kho tā devatā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
sn1.37:5.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho ekā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn1.37:7.1: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn1.37:8.2: Cittamattano ujukaṃ akaṃsu;
